head.title: Hello World Python Example
head.description: Create a simple Python powered Lambda function

body:
### [Read this on the main serverless docs site](https://www.serverless.com/framework/docs/providers/aws/examples/hello-world/python/)

#Hello World Python Example

Make sure serverless is installed. See installation guide.

#1. Deploy

serverless deploy or sls deploy. sls is shorthand for the serverless CLI command

#2. Invoke deployed function

serverless invoke --function helloWorld or serverless invoke -f helloWorld

-f is shorthand for --function

In your terminal window you should see the response from AWS Lambda

{
  "message": "Hello World"
}

Congrats you have just deployed and ran your Hello World function!
